derivation: middle voice of apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary (compare G3735 (ὀρέγομαι));
strongs_def: to stretch oneself, i.e. reach out after (long for)
outline:
1. to stretch one's self out in order to touch or to grasp something, to reach after or desire something
  2. to give one's self up to the love of money
